game.zilch

Class GameActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • game.zilch.GameActivity

  • public class GameActivity
extends Activity
    Android Activity for the screen of choosing dice and rolling. The heart of the application is right here.
    Author:
    nick & chad

      • numberOfDiceUsed

        public int numberOfDiceUsed()
        The number of dice that are actually being used when ZilchResult is being done. This prevents someone from selecting all of the dice to force a reroll of all dice or dice that don't count
        Returns:
        the number of dice that have effect on score
